**The Scripture of the Twenty-Four Images of Life from the Cavernous Mystery and Numinous Treasure**

**Scripture Title:** *The Scripture of the Twenty-Four Images of Life from the Cavernous Mystery and Numinous Treasure*. Author unknown, approximately composed during the Jin dynasty. One of the ancient *Scriptures of the Numinous Treasure*. One scroll. Base text from *The Orthodox Daoist Canon*, Primary Section.

---

The Three Divisions and Eight Radiant Spirits of the Natural Divine Perfection, at the appointed time of the Great Cycle, usher in the Crimson Clarity and the Dawn of Light. The Three Radiances shine resplendent, and the Five Kalpas begin their division.

The Celestial Venerable of Original Beginning, together with the Great Sages of the Ten Directions, the Most Perfected and Honored Spirits, the Limitless Supreme Lords of the Great Dao, the Flying Celestial Beings, the Jade Maidens of Mystic Harmony, and their innumerable hosts, all sit within the Cypress Grove Lodge of the Southern Floating Cavernous Yang. In pure discourse and serene stillness, their words flow naturally, their numinous voices harmonizing in tenfold resonance. Their wondrous hymns illuminate the True, filling all heavens with joy. The sun and moon halt their wheels, the stellar lodges traverse in silence, the Nine Heavens’ gates revolve, rivers and seas calm their waves, mountains and peaks swallow their mists, dragons and scaled creatures leap and surge, and gods and humans rejoice as one.

At this moment, the Supreme Limitless Lord of the Dao bows in reverence and addresses the Celestial Venerable: "Today, as we attend this assembly, the Great Vastness dispels the gloom, and the Limitless Worlds are all illumined. The Dharma’s sound resonates afar, its blessings extending to the Ten Directions. Yet the causes of past excesses, kalpa after kalpa, give rise to rebirth, cycling through sacred ranks, assuming the offices of the Assembled Perfected. Now, as we prepare to govern and divide the Six Heavens, to examine the kalpas and order the cycles, to assess and measure the multitudes, to reckon the long night, and to audit the records of the Three Bureaus—our duties are heavy, our labors arduous, and our joys and sorrows defy expression. Daring to ride the numinous winds, I bare my heart in resonance.

Previously, with the Celestial King of Original Beginning, I was in the Azure Grove of Long Mulberry, where we heard the Celestial Venerable proclaim to the Great Sages and Honored Spirits: Within the *Cavernous Mystery’s Celestial Writ and Numinous Treasure’s Jade Mysteries*, there exist the Three Divisions and Eight Radiant Spirits, the Twenty-Four Images—above corresponding to the Twenty-Four Perfected, the middle division to the Twenty-Four Qi, and below governing the Twenty-Four Lives. Their numinous chapters gleam resplendent, their wonders surpassing the empty void. Those who behold them have their names inscribed in the Nine Heavens’ registers, recorded on golden tablets, and attain transcendence from life and death.

Yet the coming kalpa draws near, and the Three and Five will suffer loss. Countless beings will face shortened lives, drifting through the Eight Difficulties, their bodies tormented by wind and blade, beset by the Five Sufferings, sinking into the long night, deprived of the Three Lights. Ignorant and unknowing, they endure karmic retribution, subject to the cycles of life and death. To witness this moves one to grief, stirring sorrow in gods and humans alike.

Now, the Great Compassion of the Dao’s practice bestows boundless grace. I humbly beseech the Celestial Venerable to take pity, to rely directly upon the Mystic Regulations, and to teach what has not yet been heard—so that those who have not seen may see, those who have not achieved may achieve, and blessings may flow to all, granting favor for a hundred million kalpas.

Should you deign to instruct, I shall then bear the divine winds, spreading the waves, purifying the Three Realms, suppressing the hordes of demons, rectifying the Six Heavens, beheading the legions of evil, pacifying nations and nurturing the people, so that yin and yang may rest in tranquility, enlightened governance may flourish, and the Dao may course through the Great Void."

Thereupon, the Celestial Venerable lifted his face and smiled. From his mouth emerged qi of blue, yellow, and crimson hues, their radiance penetrating all, illuminating the Ten Directions within and without. No darkness remained hidden, and for a kalpa, all was as bright as dawn. Golden script in purple characters, jade texts in cinnabar chapters—resplendent in their brilliance—appeared within the Three Qi. The Eight Radiant Spirits of the Three Divisions and the Twenty-Four Perfected, each accompanied by a thousand chariots and ten thousand riders, hovered above the Empty Mystery, guarding the numinous writ. The suns and moons of all heavens scattered blossoming light, the myriad streams converged in libation, fragrant incense coiled in eightfold spirals, and the myriad sages rejoiced, all bowing in reverence to the True.

The Celestial Venerable proclaimed: "All beings of this generation, your joy is beyond compare. With hearts laid bare and feelings fully revealed, you shall abide by the Mystic Regulations. The Seven Treasures shall guard the numinous, and a golden altar shall be raised to transmit to you the Way of the Divine Perfected. The Dao is revered, its Dharma weighty—once in forty thousand kalpas is it practiced, descending to the world to deliver beings. If kept secret, the True will descend; if revealed, calamity will arrive. Today, I impart this to you—clearly recognize it."

The Supreme Lord of the Dao rejoiced with exultant praise, standing facing north to receive the command.

The Celestial Venerable commanded the Nine Radiant Perfected of Great Brilliance, the Flying Immortals of the Ten Directions, and the Jade Lads attendant upon the scriptures to unfurl the Ninefold Radiant Jade Writ. They brought forth the golden script with purple characters, the jade-text vermilion chapters—three divisions, eight luminous scenes, and twenty-four diagrams—arrayed upon a white jade table suspended in the void. A nine-colored cloth, woven from cloud-essence and celestial patterns, served as a flying brocade canopy, draped and suspended above the scriptures.

All the Great Sages of the Heavens, the Boundless Celestial Venerables, the Flying Immortal Kings, and the Perfected of the Three Heavens simultaneously oversaw the covenant. They burned incense, scattered blossoms, chanted the numinous verses, and circumambulated the celestial palace, encircling the scriptures thrice. Following the ancient rites of reverent bearing and natural majesty, they transmitted the teachings to the Dao Lord. When the ritual was roughly concluded, the Three Luminaries returned to their positions, and the assembled Perfected withdrew from their seats.

At that time, in the Vermilion Clarity Heaven, whether man or woman, none failed to cultivate virtue, turn their hearts in faith, and aspire toward the Dao—all attained deliverance across the ages.

In the first year of the Supreme August Era, on the second day of the ninth month, the Later Sage, Lord Li, journeyed to the Western River and traversed the Eight Gates. There, he encountered the Celestial Venerable of Primordial Beginning, who rode in an eightfold luminous jade chariot, drawn by nine-colored dark dragons and threefold pure flying clouds. A procession of immortals followed, bearing floral banners, lions, and white cranes, their harmonious songs resounding as they floated through the void to convene above the Western River.

Lord Li bowed deeply and inquired of the Celestial King: "Formerly, I received your instruction and was granted the celestial script of jade characters—twenty-four diagrams. Though I obtained the text, I have not fathomed its wondrous chapters; though I possess the illustrated eulogies, their images remain absent. In my cultivation, the mysteries are veiled, and the subtleties of the Dao elude me. Today, I meet the Celestial Venerable—my joy is beyond words. I pray you bestow completion and perfect the Way of the True."

Thereupon, the Celestial King exhaled the Jade Talisman of Internal Vision from the Cavernous Mystery and bestowed it upon Lord Li, instructing him to purify himself with a thousand-day fast, anoint his body with fivefold incense, and face east to ingest the talisman. "When your form and spirit are fully prepared, you shall naturally attain penetrating insight, and all doubts will instantly dissolve."

Lord Li bowed deeply, received the celestial decree, and fully adhered to the heavenly rites. After a thousand-day fast, facing east to ingest the talisman, the Threefold Eightfold Luminous Spirits all manifested within his body. The golden script and jade characters of the twenty-four diagrams shone clearly in the void, their radiant patterns luminous and boundless, their intricate details naturally unfolding.

At that moment, he summoned the Immortal Overseer of Diagrams to render the images. The golden script with purple characters and jade-text vermilion chapters thus resounded in clarity. From the Nine Radiant Perfected Lady Wang of the Upper Prime of the Southern Culmen, the Eastern and Western Twin Floras, the Northern and Southern Perfected Lords, the immortals of the Five Peaks, to the Pure Void Perfected—all who received the true texts were those for whom the Later Sage had inscribed the diagrams, each appended accordingly.

**Diagram of the Perfected Bathing in the Eastern Well** – *First True Qi of the Upper Division*
The Heavenly River pours into the Eastern Well,
Stone reflections, essence of the Water Mother.
Circular light brushes the numinous radiance,
Mysterious brilliance responds to the exalted.
Primordial Beginning parts the long night,
Heavenly beings follow the moon’s birth.
Bathing atop the Orchid Pool,
Dragons bear the long-rope jars.
Golden youths scatter fragrant blossoms,
Jade maidens stream the Five Stars.
Crowned and girded, they bathe in jade nectar,
Refining and delivering the Five Immortal forms.
Their bodies fragrant, myriad spirits descend,
Riding the luminous to ascend the exalted.

**Diagram of the True Forms of the Five Peaks** – *Second True Qi of the Upper Division*
Wondrous, the Dao of Primordial Beginning,
Five numina unfold the true writ.
Above, it opens the Dragon Han kalpa,
Resplendent, the Three Luminaries divide.
Ten divisions of flying celestial script,
Securely settle the Five Thearch spirits.
The numinous peaks receive the Mysterious Palace,
Billowing forth treasure clouds.
Above, the undying qi,
Plants its sprouts to refine the Five Immortals.
Jade mushrooms dissolve in the mysterious,
Bodies purified, naturally perfumed.
With concentrated thought, the exalted descend,
Consorting with the Lords of the Empyrean.

**Diagram of the Eight Histories of the Numinous Communication** – *Third True Qi of the Upper Division*
Three luminaries exhale numinous blossoms,
Brilliant, the Eight Gates open.
Within, the spirit of wisdom,
Clad in flying celestial robes.
Eight histories communicate the numinous qi,
Jade talismans penetrate the subtle.
Treasure clouds reflect jade characters,
Mighty beasts shake celestial might.
Resplendent, the Eightfold Assembly Palace,
Multitudes of numinous beings fly.
With concentrated thought, summon the true qi,
Five talismans generate radiance.
Eightfold luminous chariots,
Ascend the void to enter the Purple Tenuity.

**Diagram of the Six Jia Spirits Communing with the Numinous** – *Fourth True Qi of the Upper Division*
Numinous palace, flying celestial maidens,
Six Perfected feast in constant springs.
Embracing the sun, bearing the bright moon,
Gazing upward at the Three Dawn Lights.
Communing with the numinous, they fathom the subtle,
Penetrating vision illumines the ten directions.
Summoning the natural kitchens,
Five mushrooms and six palaces flourish.
Transforming and refining the myriad spirits,
Dividing forms, altering true countenances.
Treading the void, they step into the Mysterious Capital,
Soaring high into the Cavernous Void.
At times descending as golden auroral beings,
Roaming the Threefold Pure chambers.
Holding covenants, they urge flying canopies,
Carefree, ascending the Jade Capital.

**Diagram of the Nine Palaces and Purple Chambers** – *Fifth True Qi of the Upper Division*
Purple chambers reflect the exalted clarity,
Palaces mutually support one another.
Fragrant smoke encircles sun and moon,
Flying immortals shade the Great Void.
The utmost Perfected, great sages,
Desolate, flowing feathered script.
Delivering the kalpas of all heavens,
Dust and sand begin one cycle.
Nine and five secure the numinous workings,
Long preserving heaven and earth’s abode.
With concentrated thought, how could one be distant?
The Purple Palace generates my body.

**Diagram of Primordial Beginning and the Grand Clarity** – *Sixth True Qi of the Upper Division*
The Grand Clarity knows no bounds,
Azure qi billows in the Purple Tenuity.
Numinous winds swiftly traverse the Seven Treasures,
How lush the jade trees!
Purple phoenixes sing on long branches,
Dragon scales intertwine in flight.
The Supreme surveys the ten directions,
All heavens adjust their Dharma robes.
Circumambulating the palace city,
Three circuits open the long night.
If one can contemplate the numinous qi,
One shall naturally ride the luminous in flight.

**Diagram of the True Dao’s Primal Integration** – *Seventh True Qi of the Upper Division*
Vast, the Primordial Beginning’s dawn,
Chaos’ qi yet undivided.
Three colors transform within the void,
Revolving like luminous clouds.
The obscure gives birth to true scenes,
Resplendent, unfolding numinous writ.
Brilliant, it opens the long night,
Establishing heaven and earth’s roots.
The natural wondrous true qi,
Pure and constant, ever abiding.
Circulating through the Great Nine Realms,
Opening the gates of all heavens.

**Diagram of the Western Ascent and Preservation Record** – *Eighth True Qi of the Upper Division*
Riding the swift numinous qi,
Driving the luminous to ascend the Western Palace.

To the land of Yuna That,
Ten thousand chariots come in allegiance.
Divine demons bow their heads in submission,
Heavenly kings all surrender in obeisance.
Forging gold to mold the true Dharma,
The world reveres the King of Dao and Virtue.
Thus bestowing the primal true qi,
By another name, it delivers an entire region.
At that time, an age of the Dao arose,
Called the Hall of Blessed Virtue.

**Divine Immortals’ Subtle Numinous Transformations Diagram** – *Middle Division’s First True Qi*
The wondrous Dao bears no image,
Its qi congeals in the High Mystery.
Binding emptiness, it naturally arises,
Numinous transformations revealing the Three Spirits.
At dawn, it draws the essence of the Five Stars,
Inhaling the midday nectar of the sun.
At dusk, it consumes the yellow radiance of the moon,
Reclining to refine the Five Immortals.
Transforming scenes in accord with emptiness,
Suddenly, spontaneously, it stands in the natural.

**Divine Immortals’ Radiant Numinous Nine Heavens Diagram** – *Middle Division’s Second True Qi*
The ethereal qi of the Nine Heavens,
Pure and limpid, from the High Mystery.
Auspicious clouds veil the layered void,
Golden towers bear the purple mist.
Within lies the Palace of the Great Ultimate,
Where the Lord of the Dao arrays the Great Thousand.
Azure groves fill the Brahma-vehicle,
The Ten Directions all with flying immortals.
The Southern Mound’s Hall of Blessed Virtue,
Four seats all with pure guests.
Scattering blossoms to celebrate my vow,
Carefree, without waves or ford.

**Divine Immortals’ Nine Transformations Diagram** – *Middle Division’s Third True Qi*
Wondrous transformations respond to emptiness,
Focused thought connects to the utmost numinous.
Above, consuming the qi of the Nine Heavens,
Guiding and absorbing the essence of the Five Clouds.
Three days to refine the myriad spirits,
One day to undergo nine transformations.
Shedding the body to roam the Nine Realms,
Playfully wandering the Three Realms’ courts.
Riding the luminous to gaze upon the Great Simplicity,
Numinous winds turn the green carriage.
Flying mists encircle the Ten Absolutes,
Yellow banners summon the myriad spirits.
The Heavens descend with feathered regalia,
Lushly entering the Great Clarity.

**Divine Immortals’ Constant Abiding Diagram** – *Middle Division’s Fourth True Qi*
Silently invoking the obscure perfected,
Focused stillness, the spirit naturally returns.
When the clepsydra’s flow is exhausted, external responses fade,
The true qi spontaneously becomes serene and subtle.
Accumulated resonance summons the wondrous perfected,
The Six Palaces generate radiance.
Mysterious union harmonizes with emptiness,
The myriad spirits respond in unison.
Eight luminous support the cloud canopy,
Resplendent, swift with feathered regalia.
Bearing me beyond the Great Brahma,
Carefree, riding the void in flight.

**Divine Immortals’ Guarding the One and Nurturing the Body Diagram** – *Middle Division’s Fifth True Qi*
Guiding and absorbing the qi of the Nine Heavens,
Rubbing the hands to soothe the body’s form.
Blocking the paths of deviant demons,
Polishing and refining luminous clarity.
Phoenix soaring, it connects to the true qi,
Dragon leaping, it governs the myriad spirits.
At dawn, the host of perfected assemble,
Nurturing the body, awakening the spirit’s birth.
Detached, returning to guard the One,
Still contemplation in the court of true qi.
With spirit complete, the luminous naturally flies,
Ascending to enter the Highest Clarity.

**Divine Immortals’ Guarding the Spirit and Merging with the Luminous Diagram** – *Middle Division’s Sixth True Qi*
The Muddy Pellet houses the po soul’s camp,
The Middle Prime embraces the One’s palace.
The Cinnabar Field, threefold numinous mansion,
Merging with the Hundred Spirits’ King.
The Three Passes govern the Nine Heavens,
Inhaling and exhaling the sun and moon’s light.
The Five Stars’ profound mystery nourishes,
Flowing and infusing to fill the Six Stomachs.
Still contemplation, the myriad qi return,
Spirit at peace, the form also flourishes.
The Three Divisions’ Eight Luminous Perfected,
Bearing me into the Great Void.
To dwell long through heaven and earth’s kalpas,
Without beginning, forever without end.

**Divine Immortals’ Silent Nurturing of Essence and Guarding the Will Diagram** – *Middle Division’s Seventh True Qi*
At dawn, consuming the Five Stars,
Focused contemplation, guarding the Muddy Pellet.
At the center, swallowing the sun’s light,
Silently reciting to warm the Crimson Palace.
At dusk, guiding the moon’s essence,
Irrigating the Cinnabar Field’s Lord.
Three perfected give birth to one luminous,
Transformations and forms spontaneously divide.
At first sight, the myriad spirits return,
Absorbing qi, the luminous soars aloft.
Ascending to the sun and moon’s palaces,
Exiting and entering, observing the Eight Gates.
Through dragon’s kalpas without end,
Wondrous indeed, the numinous writ.

**Divine Maidens of the Mushroom and Jade Diagram** – *Middle Division’s Eighth True Qi*
Floating, the numinous qi scatters,
Mushroom blossoms follow the wind’s turn.
The Heavens shower fragrant blossoms,
Sun and moon bathe in numinous radiance.
Jade maidens hold golden platters,
Brilliant, riding the void in flight.
Gazing upward, contemplating the perfected countenance’s descent,
Swallowing the mushroom, the Five Spirits open.
Guiding and absorbing luminous clarity,
Through ten thousand kalpas, the body does not decay.

Numinous flight adorns the Supreme Ultimate,
Jade maidens in emerald and vermilion splendor.
Gracefully they emerge, soaring through the void,
Lightly borne upon emptiness.
Mysterious and wondrous, the natural qi,
Six Yin spirits settle in constant form.
Longing for rare communion,
Gazing upward, awaiting the descent of the Six Dings.
Within the golden chamber of radiance,
Gentle and sincere in devotion.
Mysterious resonance seeks its own,
How could it be bound by form or name?
Transformations arise from mutual affinity,
Responses echo as the spirit becomes numinous.

**Divine Immortals Nine Primes Conveying Immortals Diagram** – Lower Division Second Perfected Qi
Jade Clarity illumines the Mystic Capital,
Ten sages revolve in the Purple Tenuity.
Divine immortals emerge through clouds,
Feathered robes fluttering.
Fragrant blossoms scatter with the wind,

Lush, the five-cloud mushrooms,
Mysterious radiance emits jade light.
Congealed essence pervades the numinous palace,
Wandering through the palaces of sun and moon.
Five colors govern the lofty perfected,

Guiding and absorbing the numinous qi,

**Divine Immortals Cavern’s Vast Guardian Diagram** – Lower Division Fourth Perfected Qi
Calming the mind to order the Great Mystery,
In tranquil seclusion, the host of perfected reside.
Below, they govern the myriad famous mountains,
Cavern chambers pure and empty.
Five colors illumine sun and moon,
Their ranks designated as the immortals’ storehouse.
Above, they govern the Purple Tenuity Palace,
Compiling the celestial treasures’ registers.
Within, there is a practitioner of Unity,
Meditating intently, awaiting the opening of the diagram.
The Five Elders oversee demonic trials,

The body traverses the palaces of water and fire,

Metal, wood, water, fire, and essence.

chunks.original_text: 洞玄灵宝二十四生图经 经名：洞玄灵宝二十四生图经。 撰人不详，约出於晋代。 系古《灵宝经》之一。 一卷。 底本出处：《正统道藏》正一部。 洞玄灵宝二十四生图经 三部八景自然神真，大运告期，赤明开光，三景朗焕，五劫始分。 元始天尊与十方大圣、至真尊神、无极太上大道君、飞天神人、玄和玉女、无鞅之众，同坐南浮洞阳上馆栢陵舍中，清谈虚泊，素语自然，灵音十合，妙唱明真，诸天欢乐，日月停轮，星宿默度，九天徊关，河海静波，山岳吞烟，龙麟涌跃，人神欢焉。 是时太上无极道君稽首作礼，上白天尊：今日侍座，太漠开昏，无极世界，一切见明，法音遐振，泽被十方。 过泰因缘，劫劫化生，轮转圣位，任居总真。 方当胤御，剖判六天，考劫理运，料度种民，推算长夜，检实三官，役劳任重，欢戚难言。 敢附灵风，自响披心。 前与元始天王，俱於长桑碧林园中，闻天尊普告大圣尊神云：洞玄天文灵宝玉奥，有三部八景神二十四图，上应二十四真，中部二十四炁，下镇二十四生。 灵章璀璨，妙绝空洞，睹之者九天书名，金简记录，生死得仙。 来运当促，三五伤丧，万兆短命，流曳八难，风刀痛体，五苦备婴，沦於长夜，不睹三光，无知受对，任运生死，抚之伤襟，痛感人神。 今大慈道行，惠泽普隆。 伏愿天尊有以哀矜，直据玄科，教所未闻，使未见者见，未成者成，福流一切，亿劫得恩。 如蒙训授，辄当承神鼓风，因流扬波，清荡三界，肃检众魔，部正六天，馘斩群邪，安国育民，使阴阳宁休，明化既兴，道畅太虚。 於是天尊仰面含笑，有青黄赤三色之炁，从口中而出，光明彻照，十方内外，无幽无隐，一劫晓明。 金书紫字，玉文丹章，文彩焕斓，在三炁之中，三八景神，二十四真，各从千乘万骑，在空玄之上，辅卫灵文，诸天日月，流洒华光，众津交灌，飞香八缠，万圣称庆，一时礼真。 天尊告曰：今生一切，欢乐难譬，倾心露蕴，情无遗隐。 当依玄科，七宝镇灵，黄金为坛，授子神真之道。 道尊法重，四万劫一行，下世度人。 秘则真降，泄则祸臻。 今#1以相告，明识之焉。 太上道君欣喜欢叹，唯北向而立听命。

**The Scripture of the Twenty-Four Images of Life from the Cavernous Mystery and Numinous Treasure**

**Scripture Title:** *The Scripture of the Twenty-Four Images of Life from the Cavernous Mystery and Numinous Treasure*. Author unknown, approximately composed during the Jin dynasty. One of the ancient *Scriptures of the Numinous Treasure*. One scroll. Base text from *The Orthodox Daoist Canon*, Primary Section.

---

The Three Divisions and Eight Radiant Spirits of the Natural Divine Perfection, at the appointed time of the Great Cycle, usher in the Crimson Clarity and the Dawn of Light. The Three Radiances shine resplendent, and the Five Kalpas begin their division.

The Celestial Venerable of Original Beginning, together with the Great Sages of the Ten Directions, the Most Perfected and Honored Spirits, the Limitless Supreme Lords of the Great Dao, the Flying Celestial Beings, the Jade Maidens of Mystic Harmony, and their innumerable hosts, all sit within the Cypress Grove Lodge of the Southern Floating Cavernous Yang. In pure discourse and serene stillness, their words flow naturally, their numinous voices harmonizing in tenfold resonance. Their wondrous hymns illuminate the True, filling all heavens with joy. The sun and moon halt their wheels, the stellar lodges traverse in silence, the Nine Heavens’ gates revolve, rivers and seas calm their waves, mountains and peaks swallow their mists, dragons and scaled creatures leap and surge, and gods and humans rejoice as one.

At this moment, the Supreme Limitless Lord of the Dao bows in reverence and addresses the Celestial Venerable: "Today, as we attend this assembly, the Great Vastness dispels the gloom, and the Limitless Worlds are all illumined. The Dharma’s sound resonates afar, its blessings extending to the Ten Directions. Yet the causes of past excesses, kalpa after kalpa, give rise to rebirth, cycling through sacred ranks, assuming the offices of the Assembled Perfected. Now, as we prepare to govern and divide the Six Heavens, to examine the kalpas and order the cycles, to assess and measure the multitudes, to reckon the long night, and to audit the records of the Three Bureaus—our duties are heavy, our labors arduous, and our joys and sorrows defy expression. Daring to ride the numinous winds, I bare my heart in resonance.

Previously, with the Celestial King of Original Beginning, I was in the Azure Grove of Long Mulberry, where we heard the Celestial Venerable proclaim to the Great Sages and Honored Spirits: Within the *Cavernous Mystery’s Celestial Writ and Numinous Treasure’s Jade Mysteries*, there exist the Three Divisions and Eight Radiant Spirits, the Twenty-Four Images—above corresponding to the Twenty-Four Perfected, the middle division to the Twenty-Four Qi, and below governing the Twenty-Four Lives. Their numinous chapters gleam resplendent, their wonders surpassing the empty void. Those who behold them have their names inscribed in the Nine Heavens’ registers, recorded on golden tablets, and attain transcendence from life and death.

Yet the coming kalpa draws near, and the Three and Five will suffer loss. Countless beings will face shortened lives, drifting through the Eight Difficulties, their bodies tormented by wind and blade, beset by the Five Sufferings, sinking into the long night, deprived of the Three Lights. Ignorant and unknowing, they endure karmic retribution, subject to the cycles of life and death. To witness this moves one to grief, stirring sorrow in gods and humans alike.

Now, the Great Compassion of the Dao’s practice bestows boundless grace. I humbly beseech the Celestial Venerable to take pity, to rely directly upon the Mystic Regulations, and to teach what has not yet been heard—so that those who have not seen may see, those who have not achieved may achieve, and blessings may flow to all, granting favor for a hundred million kalpas.

Should you deign to instruct, I shall then bear the divine winds, spreading the waves, purifying the Three Realms, suppressing the hordes of demons, rectifying the Six Heavens, beheading the legions of evil, pacifying nations and nurturing the people, so that yin and yang may rest in tranquility, enlightened governance may flourish, and the Dao may course through the Great Void."

Thereupon, the Celestial Venerable lifted his face and smiled. From his mouth emerged qi of blue, yellow, and crimson hues, their radiance penetrating all, illuminating the Ten Directions within and without. No darkness remained hidden, and for a kalpa, all was as bright as dawn. Golden script in purple characters, jade texts in cinnabar chapters—resplendent in their brilliance—appeared within the Three Qi. The Eight Radiant Spirits of the Three Divisions and the Twenty-Four Perfected, each accompanied by a thousand chariots and ten thousand riders, hovered above the Empty Mystery, guarding the numinous writ. The suns and moons of all heavens scattered blossoming light, the myriad streams converged in libation, fragrant incense coiled in eightfold spirals, and the myriad sages rejoiced, all bowing in reverence to the True.

The Celestial Venerable proclaimed: "All beings of this generation, your joy is beyond compare. With hearts laid bare and feelings fully revealed, you shall abide by the Mystic Regulations. The Seven Treasures shall guard the numinous, and a golden altar shall be raised to transmit to you the Way of the Divine Perfected. The Dao is revered, its Dharma weighty—once in forty thousand kalpas is it practiced, descending to the world to deliver beings. If kept secret, the True will descend; if revealed, calamity will arrive. Today, I impart this to you—clearly recognize it."

The Supreme Lord of the Dao rejoiced with exultant praise, standing facing north to receive the command.

The Celestial Venerable commanded the Nine Radiant Perfected of Great Brilliance, the Flying Immortals of the Ten Directions, and the Jade Lads attendant upon the scriptures to unfurl the Ninefold Radiant Jade Writ. They brought forth the golden script with purple characters, the jade-text vermilion chapters—three divisions, eight luminous scenes, and twenty-four diagrams—arrayed upon a white jade table suspended in the void. A nine-colored cloth, woven from cloud-essence and celestial patterns, served as a flying brocade canopy, draped and suspended above the scriptures.

All the Great Sages of the Heavens, the Boundless Celestial Venerables, the Flying Immortal Kings, and the Perfected of the Three Heavens simultaneously oversaw the covenant. They burned incense, scattered blossoms, chanted the numinous verses, and circumambulated the celestial palace, encircling the scriptures thrice. Following the ancient rites of reverent bearing and natural majesty, they transmitted the teachings to the Dao Lord. When the ritual was roughly concluded, the Three Luminaries returned to their positions, and the assembled Perfected withdrew from their seats.

At that time, in the Vermilion Clarity Heaven, whether man or woman, none failed to cultivate virtue, turn their hearts in faith, and aspire toward the Dao—all attained deliverance across the ages.

In the first year of the Supreme August Era, on the second day of the ninth month, the Later Sage, Lord Li, journeyed to the Western River and traversed the Eight Gates. There, he encountered the Celestial Venerable of Primordial Beginning, who rode in an eightfold luminous jade chariot, drawn by nine-colored dark dragons and threefold pure flying clouds. A procession of immortals followed, bearing floral banners, lions, and white cranes, their harmonious songs resounding as they floated through the void to convene above the Western River.

Lord Li bowed deeply and inquired of the Celestial King: "Formerly, I received your instruction and was granted the celestial script of jade characters—twenty-four diagrams. Though I obtained the text, I have not fathomed its wondrous chapters; though I possess the illustrated eulogies, their images remain absent. In my cultivation, the mysteries are veiled, and the subtleties of the Dao elude me. Today, I meet the Celestial Venerable—my joy is beyond words. I pray you bestow completion and perfect the Way of the True."

Thereupon, the Celestial King exhaled the Jade Talisman of Internal Vision from the Cavernous Mystery and bestowed it upon Lord Li, instructing him to purify himself with a thousand-day fast, anoint his body with fivefold incense, and face east to ingest the talisman. "When your form and spirit are fully prepared, you shall naturally attain penetrating insight, and all doubts will instantly dissolve."

Lord Li bowed deeply, received the celestial decree, and fully adhered to the heavenly rites. After a thousand-day fast, facing east to ingest the talisman, the Threefold Eightfold Luminous Spirits all manifested within his body. The golden script and jade characters of the twenty-four diagrams shone clearly in the void, their radiant patterns luminous and boundless, their intricate details naturally unfolding.

At that moment, he summoned the Immortal Overseer of Diagrams to render the images. The golden script with purple characters and jade-text vermilion chapters thus resounded in clarity. From the Nine Radiant Perfected Lady Wang of the Upper Prime of the Southern Culmen, the Eastern and Western Twin Floras, the Northern and Southern Perfected Lords, the immortals of the Five Peaks, to the Pure Void Perfected—all who received the true texts were those for whom the Later Sage had inscribed the diagrams, each appended accordingly.

**Diagram of the Perfected Bathing in the Eastern Well** – *First True Qi of the Upper Division*
The Heavenly River pours into the Eastern Well,
Stone reflections, essence of the Water Mother.
Circular light brushes the numinous radiance,
Mysterious brilliance responds to the exalted.
Primordial Beginning parts the long night,
Heavenly beings follow the moon’s birth.
Bathing atop the Orchid Pool,
Dragons bear the long-rope jars.
Golden youths scatter fragrant blossoms,
Jade maidens stream the Five Stars.
Crowned and girded, they bathe in jade nectar,
Refining and delivering the Five Immortal forms.
Their bodies fragrant, myriad spirits descend,
Riding the luminous to ascend the exalted.

**Diagram of the True Forms of the Five Peaks** – *Second True Qi of the Upper Division*
Wondrous, the Dao of Primordial Beginning,
Five numina unfold the true writ.
Above, it opens the Dragon Han kalpa,
Resplendent, the Three Luminaries divide.
Ten divisions of flying celestial script,
Securely settle the Five Thearch spirits.
The numinous peaks receive the Mysterious Palace,
Billowing forth treasure clouds.
Above, the undying qi,
Plants its sprouts to refine the Five Immortals.
Jade mushrooms dissolve in the mysterious,
Bodies purified, naturally perfumed.
With concentrated thought, the exalted descend,
Consorting with the Lords of the Empyrean.

**Diagram of the Eight Histories of the Numinous Communication** – *Third True Qi of the Upper Division*
Three luminaries exhale numinous blossoms,
Brilliant, the Eight Gates open.
Within, the spirit of wisdom,
Clad in flying celestial robes.
Eight histories communicate the numinous qi,
Jade talismans penetrate the subtle.
Treasure clouds reflect jade characters,
Mighty beasts shake celestial might.
Resplendent, the Eightfold Assembly Palace,
Multitudes of numinous beings fly.
With concentrated thought, summon the true qi,
Five talismans generate radiance.
Eightfold luminous chariots,
Ascend the void to enter the Purple Tenuity.

**Diagram of the Six Jia Spirits Communing with the Numinous** – *Fourth True Qi of the Upper Division*
Numinous palace, flying celestial maidens,
Six Perfected feast in constant springs.
Embracing the sun, bearing the bright moon,
Gazing upward at the Three Dawn Lights.
Communing with the numinous, they fathom the subtle,
Penetrating vision illumines the ten directions.
Summoning the natural kitchens,
Five mushrooms and six palaces flourish.
Transforming and refining the myriad spirits,
Dividing forms, altering true countenances.
Treading the void, they step into the Mysterious Capital,
Soaring high into the Cavernous Void.
At times descending as golden auroral beings,
Roaming the Threefold Pure chambers.
Holding covenants, they urge flying canopies,
Carefree, ascending the Jade Capital.

**Diagram of the Nine Palaces and Purple Chambers** – *Fifth True Qi of the Upper Division*
Purple chambers reflect the exalted clarity,
Palaces mutually support one another.
Fragrant smoke encircles sun and moon,
Flying immortals shade the Great Void.
The utmost Perfected, great sages,
Desolate, flowing feathered script.
Delivering the kalpas of all heavens,
Dust and sand begin one cycle.
Nine and five secure the numinous workings,
Long preserving heaven and earth’s abode.
With concentrated thought, how could one be distant?
The Purple Palace generates my body.

**Diagram of Primordial Beginning and the Grand Clarity** – *Sixth True Qi of the Upper Division*
The Grand Clarity knows no bounds,
Azure qi billows in the Purple Tenuity.
Numinous winds swiftly traverse the Seven Treasures,
How lush the jade trees!
Purple phoenixes sing on long branches,
Dragon scales intertwine in flight.
The Supreme surveys the ten directions,
All heavens adjust their Dharma robes.
Circumambulating the palace city,
Three circuits open the long night.
If one can contemplate the numinous qi,
One shall naturally ride the luminous in flight.

**Diagram of the True Dao’s Primal Integration** – *Seventh True Qi of the Upper Division*
Vast, the Primordial Beginning’s dawn,
Chaos’ qi yet undivided.
Three colors transform within the void,
Revolving like luminous clouds.
The obscure gives birth to true scenes,
Resplendent, unfolding numinous writ.
Brilliant, it opens the long night,
Establishing heaven and earth’s roots.
The natural wondrous true qi,
Pure and constant, ever abiding.
Circulating through the Great Nine Realms,
Opening the gates of all heavens.

**Diagram of the Western Ascent and Preservation Record** – *Eighth True Qi of the Upper Division*
Riding the swift numinous qi,
Driving the luminous to ascend the Western Palace.
